name: Jumping Ninja: Rooftop Run
description:
Run for your life! How far can you get?

Jump into this addictive game, which has been enjoyed by thousands of fans around the world.

Jumping Ninja: Rooftop Run is a fast-paced game where your goal is to jump between rooftops, avoid obstacles and stay alive as long as you can. Jump & run for your life! Master the mighty ninja "double jump", where you jump, then jump again in mid-air, defying all laws of physics & logic. Whatever you do, just don't fall off the roof. Stay alive!

* Jump & run as far as you can
* Double jump for endless fun

Jumping Ninja: Rooftop Run is absurdly fun game like NinJump, Paper Toss, DragonVale, Ragdoll Blaster, Strike Knight, Army of Darkness Defense, Shape Shift & more.
